SELECT COUNT(*) FROM events WHERE status = 'ONGOING'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members WHERE status = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM games g JOIN sport_booking_policies sbp ON g.sportId = sbp.sportId WHERE NOW() BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CONCAT(g.gameDate, ' ', g.gameTime), INTERVAL sbp.bookingCloseMinutesAfterStart MINUTE) AND DATE_ADD(g.gameDate, INTERVAL sbp.bookingOpenDaysBefore DAY) AND TIME(NOW()) >= sbp.bookingOpenTime;
SELECT SUM(bookingFee) AS totalBookingFeeRevenue FROM reservations WHERE status = '예매완료' AND YEAR(createdAt) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(createdAt) = MONTH(CURDATE());;
SELECT r.*, s.sportName FROM reservations r JOIN games g ON r.gameId = g.id JOIN sports s ON g.sportId = s.id WHERE r.createdAt >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC
SELECT s.sportName, COUNT(*) as count FROM reservations r JOIN games g ON r.gameId = g.id JOIN sports s ON g.sportId = s.id GROUP BY s.sportName

SELECT t.teamName, (COUNT(r.id) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations r2 JOIN games g2 ON r2.gameId = g2.id JOIN sports s2 ON g2.sportId = s2.id WHERE s2.sportName = '야구')) as reservationRate FROM teams t LEFT JOIN games g ON t.id = g.homeTeamId LEFT JOIN reservations r ON g.id = r.gameId JOIN sports s ON t.sportId = s.id WHERE s.sportName = '야구' GROUP BY t.id, t.teamName

SELECT t.teamName, (COUNT(r.id) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations r2 JOIN games g2 ON r2.gameId = g2.id JOIN sports s2 ON g2.sportId = s2.id WHERE s2.sportName = '축구')) as reservationRate FROM teams t LEFT JOIN games g ON t.id = g.homeTeamId LEFT JOIN reservations r ON g.id = r.gameId JOIN sports s ON t.sportId = s.id WHERE s.sportName = '축구' GROUP BY t.id, t.teamName
SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(issuedAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as formattedIssuedAt, DATE_FORMAT(usedAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as formattedUsedAt FROM advance_tickets ORDER BY issuedAt DESC
SELECT tt.name as ticketTypeName, COUNT(*) as salesCount FROM reservation_details rd JOIN ticket_types tt ON rd.ticketTypeId = tt.id GROUP BY tt.id, tt.name
